00021 #include <string>
00022 #include <BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge.hxx>
00023 #include "linearMotion.hh"
00024 #include "machineStatus.hh"
00025 #include "canonMotion.hh"
00026 #include "canonLine.hh"
00027 
00028 linearMotion::linearMotion(std::string canonL, machineStatus prevStatus): canonMotion(canonL,prevStatus) {
00029   gp_Pnt a,b;
00030   a = status.getStartPose().Location();
00031   b = status.getEndPose().Location();
00032   //TODO: add support for 5 or 6 axis motion
00033 
00034   myUnSolid = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(a,b);
00035 
00036   //check if the swept shape will be accurate
00037   //use the ratio of rise or fall to distance
00038   double deltaZ = abs(a.Z() - b.Z());
00039   double dist = a.Distance(b);
00040   if ( (deltaZ/dist) > 0.001) {
00041     sweepIsSuspect = true;
00042   }
00043 
00044   BRepOffsetAPI_MakePipeShell pipe(myUnSolid);
00045     pipe.Add(status.getToolProfile(),false,true);
00046     //pipe.Add(tool2d,false,true);
00047     pipe.SetTransitionMode(BRepBuilderAPI_RoundCorner); //there shouldn't be any discontinuities, but we'll set this anyway
00048     pipe.SetMode(gp_Dir(0,0,1)); //binormal to vector 0,0,1 - profile can only rotate about Z now
00049 //    infoMsg("added tool\n");
00050     if ( pipe.IsReady() ) {
00051         pipe.Build();
00052         BRepBuilderAPI_PipeError error = pipe.GetStatus();
00053         switch (error) {
00054           case BRepBuilderAPI_PipeNotDone:
00055             infoMsg("Pipe not done");
00056             errors = true;
00057             break;
00058           case BRepBuilderAPI_PlaneNotIntersectGuide:
00059             infoMsg("Pipe not intersect guide");
00060             errors = true;
00061             break;
00062           case BRepBuilderAPI_ImpossibleContact:
00063             infoMsg("Pipe impossible contact");
00064             errors = true;
00065             break;
00066           case BRepBuilderAPI_PipeDone:
00067             //ready = true;
00068             break;
00069          default:
00070             infoMsg("Pipe switch default?!");
00071             errors = true;
00072         }
00073     }
00074     if (!errors) {
00075         mySolid = pipe.Shape();
00076     }else {
00077         //infoMsg("pipe not ready!");
00078         mySolid = tool2d;
00079     }
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 //need to return RAPID for rapids...
00084 MOTION_TYPE linearMotion::getMotionType() {
00085   static bool rapid = clMatch("STRAIGHT_TRAVERSE");
00086   if (rapid) {
00087     return RAPID;
00088   } else if clMatch("STRAIGHT_FEED") {
00089     return LINEAR;
00090   } else {
00091     string err = "linearMotion::getMotionType failed on canonLine:\n" + myLine + "\n\nExiting.";
00092     infoMsg(err);
00093     exit(1);
00094   }
00095 }
